src/dds/signals.hpp

00001 #ifndef AC_SIMD_DDS_SIGNALS_HPP_
00002 #define AC_SIMD_DDS_SIGNALS_HPP_
00003 
00004 // -- BOOST Includes
00005 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00006 #include <boost/signals2.hpp>
00007 #include <boost/signals2/signal.hpp>
00008 
00009 #define DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(SIGNAL, SIGNATURE, ID)                       \
00010   struct SIGNAL {                                                       \
00011     enum { value = ID };                                                \
00012     template <typename T> struct traits {                               \
00013       typedef boost::function<SIGNATURE>            function_type;      \
00014       typedef boost::signals2::signal<SIGNATURE>    signal_type;        \
00015       typedef typename signal_type::slot_type       slot_type;          \
00016     };                                                                  \
00017   };                                                            
00018 
00019 
00020 namespace dds {
00021   
00022   template <typename T> class DataReader;
00023 
00024   // -- Data Reader Signals
00025   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_data_available,             void (DataReader<T>&), 0)
00026   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_requested_incompatible_qos, void (DataReader<T>&,  const DDS::RequestedIncompatibleQosStatus&), 1)
00027   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_liveliness_changed,         void  (DataReader<T>&, const DDS::LivelinessChangedStatus&), 2)
00028   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_requested_deadline_missed,  void (DataReader<T>&,  const DDS::RequestedDeadlineMissedStatus&), 3)
00029   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_sample_rejected,            void (DataReader<T>&,  const DDS::SampleRejectedStatus&), 4)
00030   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_subscription_matched,       void (DataReader<T>&,  const DDS::SubscriptionMatchedStatus&), 5)
00031   DECLARE_DDS_SIGNAL(on_sample_lost,                void (DataReader<T>&,  const DDS::SampleLostStatus&), 6)
00032 }
00033 #endif /* AC_SIMD_DDS_SIGNALS_HPP_ */
